daily_fact: In New York City, residents can spread love by dropping letters into red mailboxes scattered throughout the city, encouraging heartfelt connections among the community.
topline_md: New York City is bracing for a winter storm with a snow alert and travel advisory, while security measures are heightened at churches following recent incidents; additionally, a controversial sale of rent-stabilized apartments has been approved despite objections from city officials.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts

community.title: Community
community.summary_md:
